title: Raise the true damage on Ignite.
body:
OK the current damage is 410 i believe it is necessary to raise it to 420.


My argument is impenetrable.

replies.body: Raise to 420, rename from Ignite to Blaze.

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UUowb87E,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-03-31T05:30:00.326+0000)
>
> Raise to 420, rename from Ignite to Blaze.

omg too perfect yo

Then you'll have people saying "The damage on ignite/blaze is too damn high"
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
i like your idea, but let's face it: 420 would be too damn OP. We need it at 417.
wuts 417
One point of damage less than 418
https://media4.giphy.com/media/SUeUCn53naadO/200.gif
Your name should be Dankpants

It should be lowered to 400 so that it's a square number.

Nerds unite.
419 so it's prime
1000 so its like yi basic attack
1000 so I can fulfill my Level 10 dream of having a spell that deals 1000 true damage. This time there will be no "to a minion or monster" to frustrate my dream.
You should try darius :)
Or Garen- frigging 1200 True Damage ult.
Its actually magic damage.
His ult does true damage to anyone that is the villain. So he can effectively assassinate anyone.
Many people call Garen a tank. But few know his real identity: an assassin.
I stay awake nights in fear of Schrodinger's AD Garen ...
holy fuck this balance idea so fucking on point rito plz
they raise it to 10 and everyone picks it like flash

d is for dash

f is for fire

D is for DIE by fire 
F is for Flash

C is for "Certainly Gone"
V is for "Voluptuous Fire"
C for "Clean Escape" sounds better.
c is for fucking cookies
cucking fookies
I will hunt you down and eat all you cookies
{{champion:44}} OUTRAGEOUS

K is for "kick some ass" (real men only flash forwards)

\#lefthandedpeopleproblems
# #LeftHandedNoProblemWithKeybinds #Shrug

# #ILikeItBoldThough

no no no no no no no

D is for Damage
F is for Flash

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/keybind-wars-which-key-best-flash

I'm going to do as the Koreans do and keep my Flash on F.

the joke
























your head
Raise it to 10k. Lower respawn timers by half. Lower player base average IQ by 30.  Rename the game to CoD.
plz iq needs to go down at least 100

for the Supermarket?

D key is closer to the index finger, so it's better for an on demand spell like flash.
